puzzle.title: Now Boarding
puzzle.hint: First fill in the completed columns (5 or 0)
If a row or column has the same number of squares as blocks, then each block must be one square in length
First class cabin spells "US"
The solution is US ROAD TRIP.

puzzle.title: The Route / The Map
puzzle.hint: There are some key words in the paragraphs
Interesting words may be "square" and "rational"
Find all the roads that are square numbers - 25, 144, etc.
Tracing these roads will spell something
Roads spell L6
Look in cell L6 on the map
Can you find a word that might be something you want to take on a trip?
What coding has a "relief" and can be read with eyes closed?
use Braille on the map.
Notice the grid that is conviently dividied up for Braille and those mountains are curiously placed.
FIRST QUARTER
....how much of a cartographer I am.
Cartogapaher is 12 letters.

puzzle.title: Cocktails
puzzle.hint: Those drinks look pretty important to figure out for each star
Using the clues for each star and their drink, can figure out who it is?
The drinks are an anagram of their names, so The first one is "Christina Aguilera"

Here are all the stars:
- Oliver Reynolds: Christina Aguilera & Mohommand Ali - Usain Thomson: Criss Angel & Chris O'Donnell - Ian Atikinson: Neil Diamond & Kiefer Sutherland - Morris Outhwaite: Oliver Hardy & Louis Armstrong - Terry Nolan: Meryl Streep & Gillian Anderson - Neil Johnson: Charlize Theron & Duke Ellington
The sentences with "pointed" and "initial" are your next instructions
Use semaphore on the map with the intials of each person and the stars as state abbrivations

puzzle.title: The Casino
puzzle.hint: Solve the logic puzzle to get what cards each person had

The logic puzzle solves to:
- 1st - Usain - 2 & 7 - 2nd - Neil - King & Jack - 3rd - Terry - Jack & Queen - 4th - Ian - 5 & 6 - 5th Oliver - Queen & King
There is a lot of "folding" going on.... perhaps you should fold too?
Fold the map for each pair using the grid labels.
the rivers look interesting when you fold

puzzle.title: The Great American Songbook (Meta Puzzle)
puzzle.hint: Each playlist on each previous puzzle contains songs that have city names.
Trace each playlist city on the map to create a letter per playlist
Playlist spells GAME
notice that you have 5 blanks in the grid... fill those in with the 5 previous answers
This is a drop quote puzzle. Each letter in each column need to be place below to spell out a quote.
The first word is "NOTHING"
Second word is "BEHIND"
third and fourth words: "ME EVERYTHING"
